result.title: Congrats to FizzyDavid on becoming the youngest Legendary Grandmaster ever
result.content:
At only age 15, FizzyDavid(Junzhao Yang) reached Legendary Grandmaster on Codeforces Round 459. At post time, he is the youngest person ever to have such an accolade.

His rating is currently 2,955, on par with other top-rated contestants who are many years older than he is.

Congratulations!
